metadata.title: CVE-2024-23525 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The Spreadsheet::ParseXLSX package before 0.30 for Perl allows XXE attacksbecause it neglects to use the no_xxe option of XML::Twig.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl - 0.27-2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.27-2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
